title: FW de Klerk, South Africa's last apartheid leader who freed Nelson Mandela, dies at 85
content:
1. FW de Klerk, South Africa's last apartheid leader who freed Nelson Mandela, dies at 85  CNN
  2. FW de Klerk: South Africa's former president dies at 85  bbc.com
  3. F.W. de Klerk, Former South African President Who Dismantled Apartheid, Dies at 85  The New York Times
  4. F.W. de Klerk, South African Nobel Prize winner for opening government, dies at 85  The Washington Post
  5. FW de Klerk, the last president of apartheid South Africa, dies aged 85  The Guardian
